snippet: Brandon Jacobs, the Giants’ volatile running back for seven seasons, will become a free agent because he and the team could not agree on a new contract.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants release running back Brandon Jacobs in a money-saving move; other NFL news noted.

byline.original: By SAM BORDEN and JUDY BATTISTA

lead_paragraph: Brandon Jacobs, the Giants’ volatile running back for seven seasons, will become a free agent because he and the team could not agree on a new contract.

headline.main: Giants Release Jacobs in Money-Saving Move
headline.print_headline: Giants Release Jacobs In Money-Saving Move
